label: MT2652
info_overview:
The Home Control Wall Switch lets you control your Home Control devices at the press of a button. It has two
different rocker switches.
info_inclusion: Activate inclusion on the device by pressing any one of the four buttons for one second.
info_exclusion: Activate exclusion on the device by pressing any one of the four buttons for one second.
category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
parameters.overview: In separate mode button 1 works with group 1, button 3 with groups 3. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 1, double click with group 3.

parameters.label: Button 2 and 4 pair mode
parameters.overview: In separate mode button 2 works with group 2, button 4 with groups 4. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 2/4 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 2, double click with group 4.

parameters.label: Command to control Group A
parameters.description: Command sent to devices of control group A
parameters.overview:
Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group A when the related button is pressed.

In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

parameters.label: Command to control Group B
parameters.description: Command sent to devices of control group B
parameters.overview:
Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group B when the related button is pressed.

In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

parameters.label: Command to control Group C
parameters.description: Command sent to devices of control group C
parameters.overview:
Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group C when the related button is pressed.

In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

parameters.label: Command to control Group D
parameters.description: Command sent to devices of control group D
parameters.overview:
Defines the command to be sent to devices of control group D when the related button is pressed.

In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

parameters.label: Send the following Switch All commands
Block wake up even when Wake Up Interval is set
Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up

options.label: To same node as wake up notification

associations.label: Control Group A
associations.description: Control Group A, controlled by button 1 or single clicks of buttons 1 and 3
associations.overview: Control Group A, controlled by button 1 or single clicks of buttons 1

associations.label: Control Group B
associations.description: Control Group B, controlled by button 2 or single clicks of buttons 2 and 4

associations.label: Control Group C
associations.description: Control Group C, controlled by button 3 or double clicks of buttons 1 and 3

associations.label: Control Group D
associations.description: Control Group D, controlled by button 4 or double clicks of buttons 2 and 4

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.
